backstory.title: The Reluctant Leader
backstory.summary: Once a promising cadet who lost his entire squad in a failed mission, RIFT carries the weight of command and the fear of losing those he leads.

chapters.title: The Academy Days
chapters.content: RIFT excelled at the Aegis Academy, showing natural leadership abilities. His tactical mind and charisma made him a favorite among instructors and cadets alike.

chapters.title: The Failed Mission
chapters.content: During his first command, RIFT's squad was ambushed by Warmind forces. Despite his orders, three of his closest friends died. The guilt still haunts him.

chapters.title: The Redemption
chapters.content: RIFT's journey to overcome his fear of leadership and learn to trust his instincts again. He discovers that true leadership means accepting both victory and loss.

backstory.title: The Healing Heart
backstory.summary: A former civilian doctor who joined Aegis after losing her family to a Warmind attack, HAVEN dedicates her life to saving others.

chapters.title: The Medical Prodigy
chapters.content: HAVEN was a brilliant medical student who specialized in emergency trauma care. Her innovative techniques saved countless lives in civilian hospitals.

chapters.title: The Loss
chapters.content: When Warmind forces attacked her city, HAVEN watched her family die despite her medical expertise. This tragedy drove her to join Aegis Corps.

chapters.title: The New Family
chapters.content: HAVEN finds a new family in her Aegis squadmates, learning to balance her desire to save everyone with the harsh realities of war.

backstory.title: The Wild Spirit
backstory.summary: A former street racer and demolition expert who joined Aegis for the thrill and freedom, EMBER brings chaos and destruction to the battlefield.

chapters.title: The Street Racer
chapters.content: EMBER grew up in the underground racing circuits, mastering explosives and high-speed combat. Her reckless nature made her both feared and respected.

chapters.title: The Underground
chapters.content: EMBER's knowledge of the city's underground networks and her connections with the Freeholders make her invaluable for covert operations.

chapters.title: The Team Player
chapters.content: Despite her independent nature, EMBER learns the value of teamwork and begins to care deeply for her squadmates, even if she won't admit it.

backstory.title: The Precision Mind
backstory.summary: A former sniper from a elite military unit, GLINT brings unmatched precision and tactical thinking to the Aegis Corps.

chapters.title: The Elite Sniper
chapters.content: GLINT served in an elite military unit, known for his perfect accuracy and calm under pressure. His philosophical nature often puzzled his comrades.

chapters.title: The Philosopher
chapters.content: GLINT's deep thinking about the nature of war and violence led him to question his role as a soldier, eventually joining Aegis for a greater purpose.

chapters.title: The Mentor
chapters.content: GLINT becomes a mentor to younger heroes, teaching them the importance of precision, patience, and understanding the true cost of war.

backstory.title: The Tech Genius
backstory.summary: A brilliant hacker and tech specialist who joined Aegis to protect the digital infrastructure of humanity, KITE brings cutting-edge technology to the battlefield.

chapters.title: The Digital Prodigy
chapters.content: KITE was a child prodigy in computer science, hacking into corporate systems for fun. Their skills caught the attention of Aegis Corps recruiters.

chapters.title: The Cyber Warrior
chapters.content: KITE's expertise in cyber warfare and their ability to control battlefield technology makes them a crucial asset in the fight against Warmind AI.

chapters.title: The Bridge Builder
chapters.content: KITE learns to bridge the gap between technology and humanity, using their skills to protect rather than exploit, and teaching others the responsible use of technology.
